thread.title: A Petition To Have Wayne Shaw Reinstated At Sutton United Emerges Online
thread.title_full: A Petition To Have Wayne Shaw Reinstated At Sutton United Emerges Online

title: A Petition To Have Wayne Shaw Reinstated At Sutton United Emerges Online
text:
A Petition To Have Wayne Shaw Reinstated At Sutton United Emerges Online Wed Feb 22 2017 09:29:11   09:29:11 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
Just a day after Wayne Shaw was asked to resign from Sutton United following the stunt which saw him eat a pie during his side's FA Cup clash with Arsenal, a petition to have him reinstated has appeared online. 
Shaw hit the headlines yesterday after Sun Bets had offered odds of 8/1 that the 46-year-old would eat a pie on the bench during the game, but now, over 1,700 people have signed a petition to get him back in the job. 
The change.org petition reads: 'Sutton United's reserve goalkeeper Wayne Shaw was unjustly sacked for eating a pie in the dugout during his team's FA Cup tie against Arsenal. Justice must prevail and Wayne must be reinstated to the subs' bench.' 
Twitter user Guido Fawkes , who has over 220k followers, started this petition which will be eventually delivered to Sutton United Football Club. 
A number of Twitter users have already come out and supported the petition after Shaw was forced to leave Sutton yesterday. A petition has already been launched to reinstate Wayne Shaw... #piegate https://t.co/bPxqirY2Kn - Guido Fawkes (@GuidoFawkes) February 21, 2017 Petition urging @SuttonUnited to reinstate #piegate victim Wayne Shaw: https://t.co/J6FSlPTwxv ^ surely this is worth 2 mins of your time.
